name: Terran Hegemony
summary: Militaristic human empire guarding the core worlds.

name: Free Systems Coalition
summary: Democratic alliance championing independence and free trade.

name: Frontier Alliance
summary: Loosely connected frontier worlds focused on survival and mutual aid.

name: Nexus Collective
summary: Post-human technocracy led by advanced AI councils.

name: Velanthi Commonwealth
summary: Enigmatic alien power with advanced technology and limited contact.

name: Crimson Cartel
summary: Pirate confederation controlling smuggling routes and staging raids.

name: Nova Mining Guild
summary: Corporate monopoly supplying refined ores and fuel across factions.

name: Free Traders Union
summary: Neutral merchant guild offering contracts and safe harbors.

name: Archaeological Concord
summary: Academic consortium funding artifact recovery and research missions.
